global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Frontal Zone 1 (FZ-1) line 2019-09-27T12:22:00 UTC and recovered 2019-11-19T04:35:00 UTC. The glider experienced battery depletion earlier than anticipated and needed to be recovered a month earlier than scheduled.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_379
